What Is This

This demo application aims to provide a clear and concise way to manage & scale the state of an application. If all services are Singletons, what you have is organized global state. I have seen projects where all services are allowed to talk to other services, thus creating a bit of a chaotic structure of "what" is getting updated, "when", and "by who".

The aim of this state management solution is provide state management through a stream of changes. Each services can listen to the stream of updates and react accordingly (react based on a current state). I also want to improve on making controlling async flows easier, and leverage dependency injection to make testing simpler.

Let's see how this goes...
